Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory544.jpg'}
{3: 'By the time the Cerberus members push the car to a place that "looks like" a mechanic\'s shop, the sun is already setting behind the distant hills.'}
{3: 'A cracked, lopsided billboard stands outside a scruffy plywood shed under the dusk sky. Crooked letters in white are painted across the sign—"Motors & Supper".'}
{3: 'Pieces of torn fabric are tied above the board and the shed, attracting "customers" as they wave in the dusty wind.'}
{3: 'That billboard was very likely an advertisement for products that were... a little unsavory in nature.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Tch... That's no ordinary can. Turn away, kid.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Is this really a mechanic's shop? Our broken car is worth more than this shed.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis sneers, jumping down the seat.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'How big of a scam can this be?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "It's almost nighttime, Captain.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 lies on the roof of the car, stretching.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Hmm... It smells like engine oil.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I don't like it here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Let's stop wasting time in a place like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You. Go ask around and get the car fixed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Huh? Why me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I spent the most time pushing the car on the road. Why do I still need to do this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I thought you wanted to know how big of a scam this can be.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I don\'t think this is too much of a challenge to the "invincible" Noctis, right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera teases Noctis as she steps into the car and sits on his resting seat.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Tch, what a chore. Listen, don't blame me if things go wrong.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Now, sit and behold how charismatic I can be.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis shrugs and steps over the old tires, bearings, and rubber tubes that litter the floor, heading toward the raggedy garage.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory754.jpg'}
{3: 'Clang—'}
{3: 'Noctis enters the shed, accompanied by the sound of metal parts hitting each other. This place looks as dilapidated inside as it is outside.'}

{3: 'Although its interior is slightly tidier, it is filled with rusty display shelves, doors, and walls covered in green, oxidized copper, making it way less comfortable than the expansive exterior.'}
{3: 'An even stronger stench of engine oil mixes with the scent of rotting flesh, threatening to coalesce into water droplets and drip down the light bulb beneath its dim, warm hue.'}
{3: 'And yet, classical music has been playing in this place all this time in drastic contrast to how it looks.'}

{3: "A man stands behind the glass display counter. He is wearing an apron as colorful as a painter's palette, so vivid that it is a little touch-up away from serving as the hottest abstract artwork in a gallery."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Yo. We need our car fixed.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The man does not seem to notice Noctis' presence. He quietly smokes his cigarette while reading a colorful and crude magazine."}
{3: 'A smoke ring rises to the ceiling as if trying desperately to escape this awful place, but all it can do in the end is disperse among the rusted metal.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey! I said we need our car fixed!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Owner', 3: 'What would you like to eat?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'We want to fix our car! Did you hear me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Order food first. Then we can talk about your car.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The owner takes out an oily laminated paper from the counter and hands it to Noctis.'}
{3: 'In beautiful handwriting, it says—'}
{3: 'Authentic seafood paella! Guaranteed satisfaction with your aquatic fantasies!'}
{3: 'Ham and mashed potatoes sandwiches! Your best friend at home and on the road!'}
{3: 'Heartwarming specialty steaks! Fill your stomach and your soul!'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "There's seafood in this place?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Only the freshest.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis glances at a metal hook hanging from the ceiling on the other side of the shed. A piece of meat dangles there, covered in darkened soot and fluorescent green.'}
{3: 'This could be seafood, ham, or even a piece of steak.'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Good choice. That would be 3500.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I'm not eating anything! I'm here to get my car fixed!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Only now does the owner look up and stare at Noctis through his thick glasses.'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Tch. A Construct, is it? We can skip the food, then.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "It'll cost you this much. Cash only.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The owner reaches up and knocks on the number written on the crooked cardboard behind him—'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '72 thousand?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Cost price.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "There's another shop 100 km north of here if you want to take your car somewhere else.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The owner blows another smoke ring casually.'}
{3: "Noctis would not have stood for this kind of provocation normally, but his good sense has prevented him from smashing the owner's glasses into pieces."}
{3: 'Neither he, No. 21, nor Vera wants to push the car for another 100 km.'}
{3: 'With that in mind, Noctis purposefully places his left arm on top of the counter, displaying his brawny robotic arm.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, have you heard of Babylonia? Do you know about Cerberus?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Not a clue.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The owner does not seem to notice that Noctis can probably kill him with one punch using that robotic arm, and he continues to read his magazine.'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Babylonia, Boogaloonia, Cerberus, pompous, dingus... I have nothing to do with any of them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'There are a few troublemakers south of here. Go take care of it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Huh? Who do you think you are? Why would I listen to your order?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'You can pay instead.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He points at the cardboard behind him again.'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: 'Cash or labor. Get it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "Take care of the rascals that have been disrupting my business, and I'll fix your car.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "...You're pissing me off.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis tightens his fists furiously, and the cracking sound coming from his fingers sounds almost like he is crushing the man's glasses."}
{2: 'Owner', 3: "You don't have to go. Why don't I give you a discount since you're from Boogaloonia or something? 71 thousand, and I'll throw in a seafood paella as well.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Once again, the owner does not seem to acknowledge the Construct before him, simply indulging in his illustrated magazine.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '****! Listen carefully.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Our car better be fixed after this, or else!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory544.jpg'}
{3: 'Clang—'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Do you have money? Has to be cash.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Who brings cash on a mission?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '21? You hiding any cash in your sleeves?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "Money? I don't need money...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Is there nothing but bombs in your head? We Cerberus share one bank account, idiot.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Oh! I remember now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'And I asked you how it went!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "The butcher-like owner said he'd fix our car after we deal with some Corrupted for him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Alright, then. Go ahead. We'll wait here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What should I have done? 72 thousand! And I'd have to order seafood that costs 3.5 grand that looks like shit!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Cerberus names the price, not the other way around. Isn't that right, Noctis?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera teases him, but he does not notice the fury in her voice.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'I... I haggled!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "He dropped it to 71 thousand and threw in a free paella, but I thought we'd probably be more interested in some physical activities, right?", 4: '2'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...Alright. The money's coming out of your pocket.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera is about to shatter the banner spear in her hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Your vital fluid pressure is approaching the threshold, Captain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What about... we send 21 in?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "But that guy doesn't look intimidated by us. He's not even scared of Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "That's because you look dumb, Noctis. No one's scared of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I bet I could convince him to drop it to 70 thousand instead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'You thought your grenade-sized brain could—', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Constructs do not need to breathe, but Vera's M.I.N.D. directs her to inhale deeply at this point before exhaling."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Where do we need to go? I'd love to punch something right now.", 4: '2'}
